title: Magical Weapons - Audio Pack
description: 100+ Magical Weapons Sounds For Your Game!
longDescription:
Hi There!


This is the Magical Weapons audio pack, after all, who doesn't love to set the sword on fire and hit an enemy, am I right?


Here's the list!


1. Arrow_01 

2. Arrow_02 

3. Arrow_03 

4. Axe_Thunder_01 

5. Axe_Thunder_02 

6. Axe_Thunder_03 

7. Dark_Hammer_01 

8. Dark_Hammer_02 

9. Dark_Hammer_03 

10. Frost_Spear_01 

11. Frost_Spear_02 

12. Frost_Spear_03 

13. Grenade_01 

14. Grenade_02 

15. Grenade_03 

16. Harp_Heal_01

25. Sword_01

All files contain at least 3 variations! And you're getting it for free :D
